e: ￹`Pa~`torod~`en~ `kako~ `tonini~ `a~ `tayal~.￺Give me this responsibility.￻把這工作交給我做
￹`O~ `pi~`patorod~`an~ `a~ `romi'ad~ `anini~.￺This is the day that the responsibility changes hands.￻今天是交負重任的日期
￹`O~ `pa~`patorod~`en~ `ako~ `i~ `tisowanan~ `konini~ `a~ `demak~.￺I must turn over this matter to you.￻這件事情我要交託給你去做
d.f: ￹￺to hand over responsibility for￻委託，拜託，託負，交記，交付
